sentences.english: All the symmetry restoring at high temperature are demonstrated to be the second order phase transitions.
sentences.chinese: 从这里确定奇异强子物质的汽液相变是二级相变。

sentences.english: In hadron levels the hadronic masses can be introduced phenomenologically.
sentences.chinese: 强子层次上强子的质量可以唯象的引入。

sentences.english: In hadron levels the hadronic masses can be introduced phenomenologically.
sentences.chinese: 强子层次上强子的质量可以唯象的引入。

sentences.english: The equations of motion for final nuclei are discussed in density dependent relativistic hadrons field theory.
sentences.chinese: 讨论密度相关强子场理论中终核的运动方程。

sentences.english: The anomalous nucleon moments are due to hadronic effects .
sentences.chinese: 反常核子磁矩是由强子效应引起的。

sentences.english: Classifications of hadrons, unitarity symmetries of hadron, quark model.
sentences.chinese: 强子分类，强子的么正对称性，夸克模型。

sentences.english: Classifications of hadrons, unitarity symmetries of hadron, quark model.
sentences.chinese: 强子分类，强子的么正对称性，夸克模型。

sentences.english: Enhancer is a cis-function element that increased the function of promoter in eukaryotic cells.
sentences.chinese: 增强子是真核细胞中增强启动子功能的顺式作用元件。

sentences.english: In standard model, hadrons is made up of quarks and anti-quarks.
sentences.chinese: 在标准模型中，强子是由夸克构成的。

sentences.english: The hadronic force holds nuclei together .
sentences.chinese: 强子作用力保持原子核为一整体。

sentences.english: Distinguish between the function of promoters and enhancers in transcriptional regulation.
sentences.chinese: 区分启动子与增强子在转录调节中的作用。
